name: Charged_Bolts
display_help: The Juicer can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes. Charged Bolts deals light damage and also drains some Endurance.

name: Zapp
display_help: Juicers can shoot a focused electrical blast that can travel great distances with high Accuracy.

display_help: Archvillain resistance.

name: Neutron_Bomb
display_help: This devastating attack lobs an explosive sphere of deadly radiation damaging the target and all nearby foes. Neutron Bomb can bypass some of a targets defenses and reduce the targets defense.

name: Electron_Haze
display_help: The Electron Haze surrounding Dreck has reduced your Defense.

name: Atomic_Blast
display_help: Dreck has reduced your Defense and left you helpless with his Atomic Blast.

display_help: A Cybernetic Blade is a powerful lethal attack

name: Heavy_Revolver
display_help: Large caliber sidearm. Slower than a standard pistol, but can knock down foes.

name: Dull_Pain
display_help: A Freakshow can activate this power to increase his maximum Hit Points for a short time.

name: Fireman_Axe
display_help: You Defense has been reduced by the Fireman Axe.

name: Heavy_Revolver
display_help: Large caliber sidearm. Slower than a standard pistol, but can knock down foes.

name: Shotgun
display_help: Good at close range. Fires a cone of buckshot pellets and can knock some foes down.

name: Sledgehammer
display_help: There is nothing like slugging someone in the head with this baseball bat.

name: Submachine_Gun
display_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Submachine Gun.

name: Dull_Pain
display_help: A Freakshow can activate this power to increase his maximum Hit Points for a short time.

name: Revive
display_help: If the Freakshow falls, his cybernetics may Revive him from the brink of death, returning with all of his hit points.

name: Resistance
display_help: Freakshow are resistant to cold. However, they are vulnerable to energy damage. It shorts them out.
display_short_help: Auto Res Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Fear, Confuse

name: Shock_Punch
display_help: You are taking Energy damage over time.

name: Fly
display_help: Juicer can Fly!

name: Fly_fx
display_help: Special

name: Lightning_Bolt
display_help: The Juicer can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe. Lightning bolt deals good damage and also drains some Endurance.

name: Ball_Lightning
display_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area and also drains some Endurance from each target it hits.

name: Cybernetic_Hammers
display_help: You have been Disoriented.

name: Hammer_Clap
display_help: You have been Disoriented.

name: Cybernetic_Blades
display_help: A Two Handed Cybernetic Blade is a very powerful lethal attack

name: Sawblade
display_help: Cybernetically enhanced Freakshow can throw Sawblades with deadly force. So much force that they can sometimes knock down foes.

name: Charged_Bolts
display_help: The Juicer can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes. Charged Bolts deals light damage and also drains some Endurance.

name: Tesla_Cage
display_help: You have been put to sleep by a Tesla Cage. Any damage will awaken you.

name: Resistance
display_help: Freakshow Tanks are resistant to smashing and lethal damage, Knockback and Disorient. However, they are vulnerable to energy damage. It shorts them out.
display_short_help: Auto Res Smash, Lethal, KB, Disorient

name: Tank_Grenade
display_help: Launches an M30 Grenade at long range from The Tanks backpack. The explosion from the grenade affects all within the blast and can knock them back.

name: Scream
display_help: Your Scream can cause serious damage to a target, while weakening his resistance to further damage. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

name: Sonic_Siphon
display_help: By setting up a constant vibration within the body of your foe, you weaken his Damage Resistance. Affected targets will take more damage from successful attacks. Recharge: Slow

name: Disruption_Field
display_help: You set up a constant wave of sonic energy around an ally, weakening the Damage Resistance of all nearby foes. Recharge: Moderate

name: Scream
display_help: Your Scream can cause serious damage to a target, while weakening his resistance to further damage. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

name: Howl
display_help: A short range, but powerful sonic attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow

name: Shockwave
display_help: You can call forth a tremendous Shockwave that can knock down foes and deal some Smashing damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

name: Sonic_Siphon
display_help: By setting up a constant vibration within the body of your foe, you weaken his Damage Resistance. Affected targets will take more damage from successful attacks. Recharge: Slow

name: Poison_Dart
display_help: You have been hit by a Poison Dart. You cannot Regenerate you wounds while you take damage from this poison and your movement and attack speed have been slowed.

name: Poison_Dart_Blast
display_help: You have been hit by a Poison Dart. You cannot Regenerate you wounds while you take damage from this poison and your movement and attack speed have been slowed.

name: Surgical_Electric_Saw
display_help: Meat Doctors use Surgical Electric Saws to sever the limbs off their subjects.

name: Eviscerate
display_help: Meat Doctors can control their deadly appendages to attack all nearby foes in a wide arc in front of them.
display_short_help: Melee Cone Lethal, Very High DMG

name: Resurrect_Freakshow
display_help: Meat Doctors can resurrect the fallen.

name: Heal_Other
display_help: Heals a single targeted ally. You cannot use this power to heal yourself

name: Golem_Summoning
display_help: Summons a Slag Golem to a targeted location.

name: Gravitic_Emanation
display_help: You have been Disoriented and your attack and movement rate have been Slowed by a Gravitic Emanation.

name: Black_Dwarf_Strike
display_help: Your attack and movement speed has been reduced by the Black Dwarf Strike.

name: Black_Dwarf_Smite
display_help: You feel Disoriented. Your ability to Fly and your attack and movement speed has been reduced by the Black Dwarf Smite.

name: Black_Dwarf_Drain
display_help: The Black Dwarf has Drained your life to heal itself. Your attack and movement speed has been reduced by the Drain.

name: Black_Dwarf_Mire
display_help: The Black Dwarf has Drained your life to buff it's strength. Your attack and movement speed has been reduced by the Mire.

name: Gravimetric_Snare
display_help: You have been Immobilized and your attack and movement rate have been Slowed by a Gravimetric Snare.

name: Lightning_Bolt
display_help: The Juicer can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe. Lightning bolt deals good damage and also drains some Endurance.

name: Star_Punch
display_help: You have been Disoriented and your attack and movement rate have been Slowed by a Star Punch.

name: Shadow_Bolt
display_help: Your attack and movement rate have been Slowed by a Shadow Bolt.

name: Star_Punch
display_help: You have been Disoriented and your attack and movement rate have been Slowed by a Star Punch.

name: Cybernetic_Rikti_Blade
display_help: You are Disoriented.

name: Rikti_Rifle
display_help: You are Disoriented.

name: Radiation_Emission
display_help: The Radiation Emission power utilizes the healing properties of radiation to re-energize your allies. This power radiates out from the Freakshow and restores some health to all nearby allies.

name: Accelerate_Metabolism
display_help: Activating this power emits radiation that increases the running speed, attack speed, Endurance Recovery and Damage potential of all nearby allies. Affected Freakshow Metabolism is increased so much that they become resistant to effects such as Sleep, Hold, Disorient and Immobilization. Freakshow are not protected from such effects, they just ware off faster.

name: Protection_Shield
display_help: The Protection Shield protects others from smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy and negative energy attacks for a limited time. The magnetic nature of the shield makes attacks less likely to land and affect your ally. Multiple Shields can be stacked on one target to improve the defense.
display_short_help: Ally +DEF(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative)

name: Rikti_Energy_Bolt
display_help: You are Disoriented.

name: Rikti_Pistol
display_help: You are Disoriented.

name: Cloaking_Device
display_help: The Cloaking Device allows you to use an LCD body coating become partially invisible. While Cloaked you can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while Cloaked, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and have a bonus to Defense. Unlike some stealth powers, the Cloaking Device has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow

name: Shadow_Punch
display_help: The Shadow Punch has reduced your Accuracy.

name: Smite
display_help: The Smite attack has reduced your Accuracy.

name: Siphon_Life
display_help: The Siphon Life Attack has weakened you, reducing your Accuracy.

name: Gloom
display_help: The Gloom Attack is dealing Negative energy damage over time to you and reducing your Accuracy.

name: Life_Drain
display_help: Super Freak has drained your life. Your Accuracy is reduced.

name: Tenebrous_Tentacles
display_help: You have been enveloped in Tenebrous Tentacles. You are Immobilized and have your Accuracy reduced as you are crushed.

name: Electric_Fence
display_help: Surrounds and Immobilizes a single target in an Electric Fence. Deals some damage over time and slowly drains some Endurance. Useful for keeping villains at bay and bringing down fliers. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast

name: Tesla_Cage
display_help: Tesla Cage confines the target in an electrical prison. The target is overwhelmed by the electrical charge and is left helpless and can be attacked. The target is drained of some Endurance and some of that Endurance may be transferred back to you. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

name: Chain_Fences
display_help: You can immobilize multiple foes in a chain of electricity, dealing minor damage to all foes in range and draining some endurance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
display_short_help: Ranged AoE, Minor DMG(Energy), Foe Immobilize, -End

name: Static_Field
display_help: You can build up a Static Field at a nearby location. Any foes in the field may lose control of their muscles due to the static charge, and will shake violently. Foes may also be drained of some endurance, and some of that endurance may be transferred to nearby allies. Any attack will interrupt the effect temporarily and foes will re-gain control, although their movement and attack rates will be reduced. This effect can last for some time, and will continue to paralyze foes in the field. Recharge: Slow

name: Paralyzing_Blast
display_help: Summoning a large amount of energy, you can completely paralyze a group of foes in cages of electricity for a short time. These foes may be drained of some endurance as well. Recharge: Very Long

name: Reserve_Power
display_help: Should you fall in battle, you can perform a Soul Transfer, sucking the life force of all foes around you to bring yourself back from the brink of death. The more foes nearby, the more life is restored to you. Drained foes are left Disoriented. The dark effects of this Soul Transfer will actually leave you invulnerable for a brief time, and protected from XP Debt for 60 seconds. There must be at least one foe nearby to fuel the Transfer and revive yourself. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long
